amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 118-298 to clarify the time-frame in which the bill's requirements apply.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (OH) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment and the bill pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (OH) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
